title: Emails not transferring to TB
content:
I use TB via MailWasherPro to receive emails. Some of the emails which arrive at MWP do not transfer to TB. I have looked in the spam etc boxes and they are not there. I have contacted MWP and they say the emails are only previewed in MWP and have no part in the transfer.

Maybe some settings in TB are not correct?
creator: Eanie

title: Thunderbird 115.18.0 Linux - Cannot decrypt PGP encrypted message
content:
I received a PGP-encrypted e-mail which is just showing the encrypted text in mail preview and also in a separate mail window; it is not getting auto-decrypted, even though the correct key is present in the OpenPGP key management. I have this same behavior on two different setups on Linux Mint 21.1 Vera. Once I reply to the e-mail, the original message gets decrypted in the reply message, but not in the original.

I've got another setup on MacOS, same Thunderbird version, which also does not auto-decrypt the message, but in message preview provides a button "Decrypt" which does the job. But this button is missing in the Linux configs.

All setups have the correct PGP Key configured.

Any hint to resolve the issue is highly appreciated. Thanks for your time.
creator: thomas_runge

title: Reply storage
content: Where do the replied emails are stored? The originals are still in the Inbox with small blue arrows showing they have been replied, but I cannot find where the answers are stored.
creator: danetjan

title: badmailfrom list error when sending emails
content:
Hi all! Every now and then I get this error message upon trying to send emails (see image).

This happens with various email recipients. After about an hour or two I am able to send any emails without getting this error.

Also, I have absolutely no problems sending emails directly from the server, this happens only in Thunderbird and it is up-to-date, version 128.8.0esr 64-bit on Windows 11. It used to happen on my old PC running Windows 10 which I stopped using a week ago. On my new one I set the local directory to the archive I backed up from the old PC to the new one.

Has anyone experienced the same problem or has any suggestions how to fix this? Thanks in advance.
creator: TKK

title: Message Synchronisation overGPO
content:
Hello,

Is there a way to permanently prohibit message synchronization for all users via GPO or about:config in the settings, synchronization & storage space? I would like to prevent users from being able to synchronize messages offline.


Guten Tag,

gibt es eine Möglichkeit unter den Einstellungen, Synchronisation & Speicherplatz, die Nachrichten Synchronisation per GPO oder per about:config dauerhaft für alle User zu verbieten? Ich möchte verhindern, dass die User die Nachrichten offline Synchronisieren können
creator: dirk.schaefer90

title: Inbox sub-folder of 1 account not sitting under Inbox with other sub-folders
content:
At some stage, one of my Imap Inbox email accounts & its sub-folder have moved to the bottom of the list - under all other folders (Sent/Junk, etc). The Sent sub-folders for this email account are in the correct place. I have tried all solutions that I have found: Subscribing; unchecking only show subscribed; playing with the settings on the webmail server, reinstalling, etc & I still can't get it back to the top, where it's supposed to be. I have attached a screenshot as it was & how it now is (worse) after updating my OS to the latest. Does anybody have a solution for this scenario?

[Latest TB on MacOS Sequoia 15.3.1 (just updated from previous version).]
creator: MissAL

title: Cannot send email with Thunderbird 115.3.1
content:
Hi For the past week to ten days I can no longer send email from Thunderbird. I get this error message: Sending of the message failed. An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: <unknown[2a01:e0a:8e7:3350:f89c:d877:fbb2:84d1]:51018>: Client host rejected: Access denied. Please check the message recipient xxxx and try again

I haven't changed any settings and don't connect via VPN.

Thanks, SP
